about_the_game:
In a valley forgotten by time, surrounded by towering mountains and dense forests, lies a region marked by a dark history. In the heart of this territory, an ancient village prospered for centuries thanks to a pact with Eternis, a supernatural entity that demanded animal sacrifices in exchange for abundance and protection. The cult that served Eternis performed its rituals in different locations in the region, spreading its influence in every corner of that valley. When the villagers rebelled, destroying the cult and burying the central altar, they angered Eternis, who placed a curse on the entire valley. The entity corrupted the village and surrounding areas, bringing to life monstrous figures that symbolize the betrayal of the pact and transforming the environments into macabre reflections of their wrath.

Decades later, a group of strangers arrive at the place for different reasons. While exploring, they accidentally activate the remnants of the pact and awaken the wrath of the cursed creatures. To survive,

they must complete four rituals using animal parts, restoring balance and silencing the entity.

As a Survivor:

Main Objective

Investigate with your friends in search of items that will be needed to perform each ritual present in the region. Be cautious and survive the merciless killer who will not rest until all survivors are found and killed.

  • Complete Rituals: Explore to collect ritual items and take them to the altars. Work as a team to activate the 4 rituals before the killer reaches you.

  • Stay Alive: Use the environment to your advantage to hide or escape from the killer. Know escape routes, hide strategically and help your allies in critical moments.

  • Cooperation: Communication is essential. Divide tasks, distract the killer and help the team win together. Surviving alone will be almost impossible!

As Assassin:

Main Objective

As an assassin, your mission is to prevent survivors from completing the rituals. Use your unique skills to hunt them down and ensure no one survives the curse.

  • Hunt the Survivors: Use your instincts and skills to track down the survivors. Pay attention to sounds, footprints or movements in the environment that could reveal your position.

  • Stop the Rituals: Survivors need to complete 4 rituals to win. Patrol the altars and attack anyone who tries to perform them.

  • Use Your Skills: Each assassin has unique powers. Use them to surprise survivors or eliminate the group quickly.
